text: Kavak may refer to: *Kavac, Venezuela, a village within the Canaima National Park, a cave near the village in the Canaima National park in Bolívar State *Kavak, Samsun, a district in Samsun Province, Turkey *Kavak, Silifke, a village in Silifke district of Mersin Province, Turkey *Kara-Kavak, village in the Osh Province of Kyrgyzstan *Erhan Kavak, Turkish-Swiss footballer And in India 'kavak' refer to: 'fungus' English word ==See also== * Kavaklıdere (disambiguation) Category:Turkish-language surnames
title: Kavak
